title: genomeLocation
description: Location of a sequence object used both by display, and to render a browser. All indexes should be 0 based.

assembly.description: The assembly on which the position and chromosome are based. If possible this should be the Ensembl assembly, otherwise this should be an id for the assembly. The assembly may be specific to the database.

gca_accession.description: The assembly on which the position and chromosome are based.

ucsc_accession.description: The assembly on which the position and chromosome are based.

INSDC_accession.description: The assembly on which the position and chromosome are based.

startPosition.description: the start position of the location.

endPosition.description: the end position of the location.

chromosome.description: the chromosome of the genomic feature.  Note: whatever loaded here, will be used in JBrowse.
